interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Life of Birds
Review Date: 2013/02/14
Store: Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Documentary
Product Description: ["The definitive series on the most colorful, popular and perfectly adapted creatures on earth, The Life of Birds traverses the globe, covering 42 countries and examining over 300 different species. Calling upon the immense skills of many of the world's top wildlife cameramen and women, and pushing filming technology to the limits, new behavior is brought to the screen in staggering detail. Infra-red cameras find oilbirds deep in pitch black caves. Ultra slow motion film unravels the complexities of bird flight and ultraviolet cameras reveal the world from a bird's point of view."]
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Classics, Documentary', 'Format': "Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Full Screen, NTSC, Collector's Edition", 'Contributor': 'David Attenborough', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Media Format': "Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Full Screen, NTSC, Collector's Edition", 'Run time': '9 hours', 'Release date': 'September 27, 2005', 'Studio': 'BBC Video', 'Number of discs': '3'}
Review Text: This was purchased as a gift and was greatly appreciated.  It is always exciting to give something that can be enjoyed by the whole family over and over.
Review Title: Makes a great gift!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
The Life of Birds
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Documentary
["The definitive series on the most colorful, popular and perfectly adapted creatures on earth, The Life of Birds traverses the globe, covering 42 countries and examining over 300 different species. Calling upon the immense skills of many of the world's top wildlife cameramen and women, and pushing filming technology to the limits, new behavior is brought to the screen in staggering detail. Infra-red cameras find oilbirds deep in pitch black caves. Ultra slow motion film unravels the complexities of bird flight and ultraviolet cameras reveal the world from a bird's point of view."]
{'Genre': 'Classics, Documentary', 'Format': "Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Full Screen, NTSC, Collector's Edition", 'Contributor': 'David Attenborough', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Media Format': "Multiple Formats, Box set, Closed-captioned, Full Screen, NTSC, Collector's Edition", 'Run time': '9 hours', 'Release date': 'September 27, 2005', 'Studio': 'BBC Video', 'Number of discs': '3'}
This was purchased as a gift and was greatly appreciated.  It is always exciting to give something that can be enjoyed by the whole family over and over.
Makes a great gift!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Content Focus**: Documentary films, particularly nature-related and wildlife content.
- **Preferred Format**: DVD, especially multi-format or collector's editions which offer comprehensive viewing experiences.
- **Target Audience**: Family-oriented content that appeals to multiple age groups and can be shared among family members.
- **Gift-Giving**: Enjoys selecting and giving gifts that are educational and entertaining, highlighting a preference for thoughtful and impactful presents.
- **Quality Appreciation**: Values high production quality, including advanced filming techniques and engaging storytelling.
- **Emotional Engagement**: Places emphasis on the enjoyment and appreciation of gifts, suggesting a tendency towards selecting items that foster family bonding and shared experiences.
- **Overall Ratings**: Tends to have a positive outlook towards products, as indicated by a high rating for a previous purchase. 

This profile reflects a user who is passionate about educating themselves and others through quality documentaries, with a strong inclination towards content that is enjoyable for families.
